Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Platyelminthes \Plat`y*el*min"thes\, n. pl. [NL. See {Platy-}, and {Helminthes}.] (Zo["o]l.) A class of helminthes including the cestodes, or tapeworms, the trematodes, and the turbellarians. Called also {flatworms}. [1913 Webster]
